Yup, Megatron is 12 feet here.

BIC:
Megatron snarled again. "Dont' ever compare me to that disapointment."
Megatron threatened in a whispering tone. "True I was made into him, but
my psyche remained intact, as we shared the same body, and I was able to
watch as he ran my dream into the ground." His fusion cannon began to
hum, a sign it was processing energy. "If you want more, concrete proof,
I can show it to you." He threatened.
